nodes.bodyText: Not everything from here will be in SystemUtil. Should the document clarify that some methods will completely go away?
Is there a reason not to use String.join for these? There is a join version with arrays and iterables, so aren't all of the SystemUtil.join uses replaceable?
No, String#join takes an iterable of CharSequences only.  annotatedTargets(), for example, is TargetType[].
